p: The aqueous, acetone, ethanol and methanol T. trifidum extracts contained condensed tannins, flavonoids and phenolic compounds which showed significant free radical mopping capabilities. In addition, the extracts demonstrated antibacterial activity against gram-negative and gram-positive bacteria. The T. trifidum extracts can potentially be used as a natural source of antioxidant with antimicrobial components and can therefore be used as preservatives.
